thig2.3:0.3: Verses of the Elder Sumaṇgala's Mother
thig2.3:1.2: I am well released and free from the pestle,
thig2.3:1.3: from my shameless husband who made umbrellas,
thig2.3:1.4: and from the small pot that blows like a water snake.
thig2.3:2.1: I put an end to greed and hatred,
thig2.3:2.3: Having approached the root of a tree,
thig2.3:2.4: I contemplate 'Oh happiness!' while in happiness."
